sql.query: select max(OPERATION_COMPLETED) as OPERATION_COMPLETED, organization_id, wip_entity_id from WIP_OPERATIONS group by organization_id, wip_entity_id

select inventory_item_id, wip_entity_id, organization_id,required_quantity, supply_subinventory from wip_requirement_operations union all (select null,jobs.wip_entity_id, jobs.organization_id,null,null from wip_discrete_jobs jobs, wip_requirement_operations req where jobs.wip_entity_id = req.wip_entity_id (+) and jobs.organization_id = req.organization_id (+) and (req.wip_entity_id is null or req.organization_id is null) )
select wreq.*, jobs.wip_entity_id as jobs_wip_entity_id from wip_discrete_jobs jobs full outer join wip_eam_work_requests wreq on jobs.wip_entity_id = wreq.wip_entity_id
SELECT * FROM WIP_DISCRETE_JOBS
select jobs.wip_entity_id as jobs_wip_entity_id, opr.* from wip_discrete_jobs jobs, wip_operations opr where jobs.wip_entity_id = opr.wip_entity_id (+)

select jobs.wip_entity_id as jobs_wip_entity_id, opp.wip_entity_id as opp_wip_entity_id, opp.operation_seq_num as opp_operation_seq_num, opr.* from wip_operations opp, wip_operation_resources opr, wip_discrete_jobs jobs where opp.wip_entity_id = opr.wip_entity_id (+) and opp.operation_seq_num = opr.operation_seq_num (+) and jobs.wip_entity_id = opp.wip_entity_id (+)
select ent.*, jobs.wip_entity_id as JOBS_ENTITY_ID from wip_entities ent, wip_discrete_jobs jobs where ent.wip_entity_id = jobs.wip_entity_id (+)
select poh.rowid, poh.* from po_headers_all poh
select * from po_headers_all_dfv
select mea.rowid, mea.* from mtl_eam_asset_attr_values mea
select * from mtl_eam_asset_attr_values_dfv

select meaav.ASSOCIATION_ID, meaav.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, meaav.SERIAL_NUMBER, meaav.ORGANIZATION_ID , meaavd.load, meaavd.Mast , meaavd.model , meaavd.make from MTL_EAM_ASSET_ATTR_VALUES meaav , MTL_EAM_ASSET_ATTR_VALUES_DFV meaavd where meaav.rowid = meaavd.rowid and context_value = 'Fork Lift Classifications'

select meaav.ASSOCIATION_ID, meaav.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, meaav.SERIAL_NUMBER, meaav.ORGANIZATION_ID , meaavd.coverage , meaavd.warranty_type, meaav.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY from MTL_EAM_ASSET_ATTR_VALUES meaav , MTL_EAM_ASSET_ATTR_VALUES_DFV meaavd where meaav.rowid = meaavd.rowid and context_value = 'Warranty Data'
select * from mtl_parameters
select * from po_requisition_headers_all
select * from po_requisition_lines_all
select * from po_req_distributions_all
select * from po_lines_all
select * from po_distributions_all
